body.name: YIOU Air Purifier for Home, Large Room Up to 1076 Ft², Quiet 24dB Air Cleaner with Remote Control, H13 HEAP Filter for Pet Hair, Smoke, Dander, Auto Mode for Bedroom Living Room Babyroom, M1(Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 32 mins
features: Double-side Air Intake For Large Room: YIOU M1 air purifier can filter spaces up to 1076 square foot/100 square meter room becase this air purifier adopts dual side air intake! Different from classcial single air inlet design,M1 performs purification work on dual sides simultaneously, greatly improving the purification speed.Modern design fits from small to large room, office, bedroom, living room, nursey, kitchen and basement.

Sleep Like a Baby: If YIOU M1 pet hair cleaner in Slepp Mode, the M1 fans will at the quietest fan speed and indicators light go off.It's ultra-quiet Sleep Mode(24dB) ensures a peaceful night's sleep without any disruptive noise.Enjoy undisturbed rest while the air purifier silently cleanses the air around you. Wake up refreshed and rejuvenated!

LED Display with PM2.5& Auto Mode: The YIOU M1 home air pufifier is built-in PM2.5 sensor that can continuously monitor the air quality in real-time and users can view this data through LED display simultaneously.Auto Mode adjusts the speed according to the air quality in the room. When Auto mode is enabled (indicated by an A symbol of the display), the on-board chip will intelligently adjust the speed of the purifier according to the air quality.

All-in-One Air Purifier: ①M1 home air purifier adopts H13 True HEPA 3-stage filter that filtering 99.97% of airborne contaminants 0.3 microns in size, purifying for wildfires, pet hair odors,pollen,smoke. ②The air purifier for dust has 1/2/4/8H timer,it helps saving energy by automatically turning off when not in use. ③Child Lock Function could freeze the touching panel, this is a useful function if you have curious children or pets at home.

Convenient Control: YIOU bedroom air purifiers equipped with a physicial remote control, you can effortlessly adjust the air cleaner settings from anywhere(avaliable distance 5m/196ft) in the room. No more touching panel or getting up to change the speed or swith of the air purifier.

YIOU 1-YEAR Warranty: YIOU stands behind the quality of our air beds. If you experience any issues with your air purifiers, please contact us directly and we will make it right immediately. Our air cleaner come with a 1-YEAR warranty and a full refund is available within 30 days of purchase. In addition, we provide a 24-hour professional service center to assist with any questions or concerns you may have.

reviews.reviewText: i smoke cigars daily in the lower level of my home and the smell never reaches the top area. I usually leave it on in an hour to 45 mins the smell is gone i love this product

reviews.reviewText: Nice and quiet in the bedroom. Timer function is perfect, low noise level. Cleans the air pretty good in our master bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars As pictured and described; a bit pricy but works well
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this after a bad bout of dip flu (an allergic reaction to something in the dip powder application process for fingernails). I have been impressed with this air filter on many levels. It is reasonably quiet (but will provide you with adequate white noise if that's what you're looking for). It has also done a good job of filtering the air as evidenced by my lack of recurrence of dip flu.I have found that this is not super intuitive to use... You'll definitely want to read all of the directions to get the maximum value from it. It also does take up a decent amount of space but not more than other similar air filters that I have used in the past.Currently, the price is $129.99 and a $40 off coupon is offered. I feel like that price is reasonable for what you get. I'm not sure that I would be willing to pay full price for it though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There were several things I liked about this air purifier. It is very light so it can be moved around different rooms if necessary , it’s very quiet and it has a remote and it did help take the musky smell from the room . I just haven’t figured out how to set the timer the directions were a little confusing but besides that it works well .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet Operation//PM 2.5 Active Monitor, Display//Auto Mode//Timer Available//Remote//
reviews.reviewText: I have numerous Air Purifers. Moreover, I have another Yiou Purifer, a smaller unit, and I have been very pleased with it. Consequently, I decided to acquire this unit, the M1. The M1 is a very nice machine, and it performs admirably in the pursuance of clean air. Specifically, this purifier has a PM 2.5 Air Quality Monitor built in and has a clear, easily readable display. Furthermore, the M1 can cover a large space, area with ease. In sum, the machine is quiet in operation, it has numerous levels of operation, low, medium, high and an auto mode. The auto mode allows analysis of the air actively, and therefore adjust speed levels up or down as warranted. The current price point of $129, less a $50 coupon, for a net price of $79, is an exceptional deal in view of the performance level. I highly recommend the purchase of this product.
